column2: electroCore, Inc. is a commercial stage medical device company, which engages in the provision of non-invasive vagus nerve stimulation (nVNS) therapy. The company is headquartered in Basking Ridge, New Jersey and currently employs 91 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in developing non-invasive vagus nerve stimulation (nVNS) therapy for the treatment of multiple conditions in neurology, psychiatry, gastroenterology and respiratory fields. The firm's gammaCore is a simple-to-use hand-held device that provides non-invasive dispensing therapy, which stimulates the cervical branch of the vagus nerve. The gammaCore is a non-drug treatment for adults who suffer from episodic cluster and migraine pain. The firm's target is the treatment of primary headaches (migraine and cluster headache), and the associated chronic co-morbidities of gastric motility, psychiatric, sleep and pain disorders.
